product.text:
The Sorcerer’s Apprentice

Inspired by the renowned Disney animated film Fantasia, this imaginative tale recounts Mickey’s adventures as the sorcerer’s apprentice. As a trainee, Mickey works hard chopping wood, sweeping the floor, and carrying water from the well. Exhausted from manual labor, he tries to use a few of his master’s tricks to save himself work, and is dismayed when his magic backfires.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to list a few tasks that she would like to magic her way through. Encourage her to explain why these tasks are difficult, and then brainstorm for ways to make them easier or more enjoyable.
